negotiator.timeline

Interface TimeLineInfo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContinuousTimeline, DiscreteTimeline, PausableContinuousTimeline, Timeline

    public interface TimeLineInfo
extends java.io.Serializable
    read-only access to the actual timeline information. The returned information should be up to date at all times and automatically updated.
    Author:
    W.Pasman

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getCurrentTime() 
      double getTime()
      Gets the time, running from t = 0 (start) to t = 1 (deadline).
      double getTotalTime() 
      Timeline.Type getType()
      In a time-based protocol, time passes within a round.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        Timeline.Type getType()
        In a time-based protocol, time passes within a round. In contrast, in a rounds-based protocol time only passes when the action is presented.

      • getTime

        double getTime()
        Gets the time, running from t = 0 (start) to t = 1 (deadline). The time is normalized, so agents need not be concerned with the actual internal clock.
        Returns:
        current time in the interval [0, 1].

      • getTotalTime

        double getTotalTime()
        Returns:
        amount of time in seconds, or amount of rounds depending on timeline type.

      • getCurrentTime

        double getCurrentTime()
        Returns:
        amount of seconds passed, or amount of rounds passed depending on the timeline type.
